items.title: Netflix’s Likely Oscar Nominee Has A 95% Rotten Tomatoes Score

items.title: Millions Of Online Identities Stolen—Are You Now At Risk?
items.description: McAfee buys MineOS consumer privacy business to stop millions of users losing their identities.
